front.title: Enhanced BGP Capabilities for Exchanging Second-Best Paths

abstract.t: This Internet Draft describes an enhanced format for encoding prefixinformation, to permit multiple copies of a prefix with differentpaths to be announced and withdrawn.Prefix instances using the new format include both uniqueidentifiers, and ordinals to control path selection.Withdrawal of prefixes requires a slight modification to disambiguateprefix instances.Author's NoteThis Internet Draft is intended to result in this draft or a relateddraft(s) being placed on the Standards Track for idr.The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in thisdocument are to be interpreted as described in [4].
